rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with ample natural light, following Vastu principles by aligning with the east to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area designed for minimalistic aesthetics and comfort; furniture is kept simple and functional.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed with a minimalist approach. The dining space allows good natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficiently designed kitchen using cost-effective materials; incorporates Vastu recommendations by placing on the south-western corner if possible for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Compact guest room ensuring privacy and comfort with minimalist decor.

openings.description: Large windows placed strategically for ample daylight, ensuring a good view of the outdoors and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed to maintain a minimalist style and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort for other family members; includes window arrangements in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Compact, functional bedroom designed to meet minimal living standards while respecting space constraints.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom optimized for space utilization and efficient natural light exposure.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached bathroom to Master Bedroom 1, designed with minimalist fixtures and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring natural light and cross-ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom for extended family or guest use, with simple minimalistic design and optimal natural light.

rooms.name: Lounge Terrace
rooms.description: Open terrace providing relaxation space, aligned with Vastu by ensuring it faces the east for morning sunlight.

openings.description: Connects directly to interior spaces, enhancing accessibility and natural light.
